[set page_title]Upload Your Images[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@ You may now upload graphics for your catalog items. Valid files to upload are JPG or GIF. ZIP files containing multiple images are also allowed.

You may also consider using FTP or SSH to upload your images to the server at a later time.
